backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, wallet balances, deposit requests, and admin‑gated review workflows with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across auth, wallet, admin, store, and layout areas.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining an OKLCH‑based light/dark theme with custom design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, auth gating, profile setup flow, and route definitions.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when non‑admins attempt to access admin‑only pages.
App layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, admin links, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error recovery.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/D: Dialog for admins to review and approve a deposit request with mutation handling and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal that collects and submits a user's display name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/features/wallet/components/: Form allowing users to enter an amount and create a deposit request via mutation.
Table displaying a user's deposit requests with status badges and timestamps.
Card showing the user's current wallet balance or a loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated/anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, balances, deposit requests, transactions, and admin checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDepositsPa: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, and approving or rejecting deposit requests with status badges and a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Displays the store page showing user balance and a placeholder for future rig packages.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the user's transaction history with formatted timestamps, icons, and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Shows wallet balance, deposit request form, deposit requests table, and a link to view transactions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, storing, persisting, and clearing URL or session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project's current state, architecture, existing features, and pending feature requests.
